Book

The Greek Imperial

Experience the magnificence of Greece in Tarpon Springs. The Greek Imperial invites you to enjoy the best guest experience you have ever had. The Imperial is a reflection of the Greek heritage of the city and we have been proud to support Tarpon Springs' tourism development for more than 10 years.

There is something to do for everyone! Delight your palate at our signature restaurant Aphrodite's Cave at The Imperial. Have a great time at our pool and then get into our spa to let yourself go in a tranquility oasis... All of this is awaiting for you in The Greek Imperial!

Ballrooms

The ballrooms are beautifully appointed with crystal chandeliers and a creamy color palette that is sure to compliment your chosen color scheme or preferred décor. The ballrooms can comfortably accommodate up to 500, 250 or 100 guests for a sit-down meal with ample room for a dance floor and staging.

Book Now

Conference Rooms

We can help you make arrangements, from mixed seating for one session, then a communal meeting set-up with lots of screens. And later, something more formal. In between it all, we will design some casual break-out venues plus open networking spaces.

Tarpon Springs

Back in the early 1900s, sponges were discovered in the water off the coast of Tarpon Springs. This attracted Greek sponge divers to the area, which is now home to the largest Greek community in the United States. This hidden gem is like a trip to Greece!

So, are you ready for a Mediterranean get-away? Visit Tarpon Springs for their unique shops, delicious restaurants and very interesting history!

Amenities

Complimentary Privileges

Your stay at the Imperial includes free premium wi-fi, complimentary Greek and American breakfast and complimentary Valet Parking for every guest.

Restaurant

At the Imperial you feel the Greek vibes, what better than a Dolmades, a Moussaka and a variety of traditional dishes and signature cocktails to create the right atmosphere?! Aphrodite's Cave is your place.

Pool

Enjoy a great time at our outdoors pool, refresh and repeat surrounded by a stylish setting for relaxing, outdoor recreation, and dining.

Gym and Spa

At our indoors gym you don't have to sacrifice your workout, you are welcome to join our exclusive training routines and equipment and afterward, let yourself go in our luxurious spa.

Store

Getting that last souvenir from your trip to Tarpon Springs? Come on down and take a look at our great selection of Greek products and Tarpon Springs exclusives at our Korintos Shoppe.

Rooms for Special Events

Hosting you dream wedding, sweet sixteen, fundraising event? We are here for you, we can help you plan your party or just reserving one of our elegant ballrooms.

Your Opinion Is Everything!

I had a wonderful experience at the Greek Imperial. Every staff member I encountered, from the valet to the check- in to the cleaning staff were delightful and eager to help! Thank you! Will recommend to my colleagues!

Crystal, New York.

This is the perfect hotel for a weekend getaway in Tarpon Springs. The downtown area is a best kept secret and the Imperial offers everything you need if you don’t feel like venturing out.

Patrick, San Diego.

The best hotel I’ve ever been privileged enough to stay at. Gorgeous building, and it only gets more breathtaking when you walk in. High quality rooms and high quality service. You really feel you are in Greece!

Rose, Tacoma.
